title: Disguise +2
desc:
Post 53
- Acts exactly as a normal +2 (11). When played, it appears as if you played a +2 (11).
- When you play this, select any two cards in <#1106231378443505785>. The cards that are drawn will appear to be those cards, and their true identity is revealed when played.
- If a disguised card is played and would not be able to be put down, the target draws 2 cards and the disguised card is not played.
